# Thematic Analysis

## Dataset Description

The dataset in this activity consists of a set of documents relating to heritage, downloaded from the Southern Midlands Council website [@southern2020].

| Report Name                                                    | Filename                                        | Coded with Taguette |
|------------------|-------------------------------------|------------------|
| Kempton Streetscape Study 1997                                 | CCD_Projects_Kempton_Streetscape_Study_1997.pdf | No                  |
| Southern Midlands Council Historic Heritage Strategy 2014-2018 | Heritage_Documents_SMHHS14_18V4.pdf             | Yes                 |
| Southern Midlands Council Historic Heritage Strategy 2019-2023 | Heritage_Documents_SMHHS_19_23_FINAL.pdf        | Yes                 |
| Annual Report 2009-2010                                        | southernmidlands_annual_report_2009_2010.pdf    | Yes                 |
| Annual Report 2020-2021 with Financials                        | Annual_Report_2020-21_with_Financials.pdf       | Yes                 |

: Reports Used in Thematic Analysis

## Definitions of data, key terms, themes or coding schemas

The file containing the codebook exported from Taguette is 'codebook.csv'.

The file containing the tags and highlighted text is 'all_tags.csv'.
